views.markdown:
1. Uses Anemone's engine to theme dock 2. Fully supports iPhone 6+ and iOS 8.4 3. Configuration options in Anemone Support iPhone 6+ (Modern Mode Only).

Classic Mode on the iPhone 6+ is supported /ONLY/ with 3rd party themes.

All functionality works as usual on iPhone 6 and lower.
Fix issue where Blurred Reflections was missing from settings panel.

1. Support for iOS 8!
2. Support for iPhone 6.

Note: iPhone 6+ support will be available shortly, sit tight!
1. Add Option for blurred reflections Add support for upcoming libghost library Looks like I finally put an end to the reflection bug on 7.1.x.

Allow winterboard themes to apply an overlay on top of the modern dock (ModernDockOverlay.png & ModernDockOverlay-Landscape.png).

Winterboard themers: If you have any more requests for ClassicDock, I'm listening :)

Add iPad support to Modern mode.

1. Finally version 1.0! (Notice how the version numbers before were less than 1 :P)
2. Add "Modern" mode for those of you who want a blurred dock with the iOS 6 shape instead of the iOS 6 dock image. Configure in settings.
3. Make icon bouncing more realistic (thank you Reed Weichler)
4. Extended the reflection again all the way to the bottom (some people didn't like this?)
5. Attempted to fix the reflection bug in 7.1.x (I don't get it anymore, but not sure about others)
6. As always, ClassicDock fully supports WinterBoard, including the new Modern Dock feature.
1. Add full support for iOS 7.1.x
2. Added "Bounce Icon on Launch" option due to many requests for it (disabled by default, enable in settings if you want it).
1. Adds Full Support for the iPhone 4 ClassicDock themers update!
1. Support for theming indicator lights via WinterBoard
2. Support for theming the background overlay via WinterBoard
3. Add a toggle for the background overlay due to the excessive number of complaints about it

Many exciting changes have been added to this ClassicDock update!
The Bug Fixes:
1. InfiniDock compatibility
2. Safari Addressbar Fix
3. iPad Multitasking Gestures Compatibility
New Features:
1. Actual, live icon reflections just like how they were done on iOS 6! Fast and fluid!
2. Killswitches in Settings (Respring to Apply)
3. Running indicators in the dock under running apps

1. Reflection is now faster
2. The reflection is only updated when needed for better battery life 3. Moar 64 Bit Fixes!
4. Seems to work on some iPhone 4's but doesn't seem to work on others. I'm trying to debug this ATM (might be iPhone4Parallax's blur option fixing it, but can't tell).
5. Does anyone read these?

The dock now reflects in realtime :) Who needs a blurred dock when you can have a reflecting dock?
Adds support for resizing the reflection using Winterboard

Adds iPad Support

Does not work on iPhone 4 or iOS 7.1. iPhone 4 support will be added soon.
